description.value:
As a Full Action, user may make a +20 BS Test to illuminate a target, if successful, target is marked until the beginning of the user's next turn. Any character making a ranged attack against the marked target counts as if they had spent a full action aiming, and gain the appropriate benefits.

Requirements

Xenotech. +20 to Acquisition Tests for this item if acquired through Friendly Tau Settlement.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
